values: An angle is the direction from which something is looked at.
The giraffe turned its head to see from another angle.

角；角度，立场，观点
To angle is to fish with a rod and line or to position oneself for a particular view or advantage.
An angle is the measurement of the space between two intersecting lines or surfaces.
